mapper.select: SELECT t.address as address, t.id as id, t.room_no FROM address_unique t
SELECT t.address as address, t.id as id, t.room_no FROM address_unique_deal t left join sh_residence_info r on t.residence_id = r.ResidenceId where r.ResidenceId is not null
select count(1) from address_unique_deal t left join sh_residence_info r on t.residence_id = r.ResidenceId where r.ResidenceId is not null
SELECT t.address as address, t.id as id, t.roomnum as room_no, t.ResidenceId as residence_id FROM house_deal_address300w t
